deshiya kiri upayogi karaganimin nishpaditha milko,hayiland nishpadana me wana wita paribhogikayan athara itha ihala agayaka alewiyak pawathina bawath gramiya pasal daruwanta kiri widuruwa labadime wadasatahana da mema aayathanaya thulin kriyathmaka wana bawin da dainika kiri ekras kirima thiwrara kala yuthu bawa amathyawaraya mehidi pawasiya.

wan rathawala prawahanaya kerena pasal daruwange aarakshawa wenuwen kanthawak da yodaganna lesa lama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathi thissa karalli yadda mahatha illimak karayi.shighrayen siduwana lama apachara madalime ek piyawarak lesath, boho pasal wanratha thula lamayin arennata riyaduran pamanak gaman ganna bawath lamayinge aarakshawa sambandhayen pawathina gatalu salakillata gena thama me thiranaya gath bawath amathyawaraya dinaminata pawasiya .pasal wan ratha thula kanthawak sitimen thamange rukawaranaya pilibanda daruwange manasika thaththwaya ihala mattamaka pawathimath aathma wishwasaya usas thaththwayaka pawathimath siduwana bawa amathiwarayage adahasa wi thibe..
ee gahe thibba adi thunak withara udin polowata samantharawa namunu aththak.

aduwak lesa pawathina lowa bawata pathwime dakmak owunata awashayayi.

me gataluwa nirikshanaya kirimedi ema kalapaye aithihasika pasubimada wadagath weyi. 1833 di kolbruk kamaran prathisanskarana handunwadimen pasu lankawa palath pahakata kheda wen kirima sandaha brithanyayan wisin widhi widhana yeduha.
ja.wi.pe aasana ekakwath ganne na.

eda dumriyen mema mudal ragena yaddi dumriya nawatha mankollakaruwan ema mudal mankolla kaha. 1963 agosthu 08 wanida sidukala ema mankollayen sorakam kala pawum miliyana 2.6ka mudala ada kalaye thakseruwe hatiyata pawum miliyana 60kata adhika weyi.

jana sankhyawa ha wishalathwaya anuwa nagarika janawasa warga kala hakiya 1.kuda nagara 2.madhyama pramanaye nagara 3.maha nagara 4.miliyana nagara 5.dawantha nagara 6.purawara ha nagarayaya nagarika janawasayak bihi wimata balapana sadhaka: 1.gramiya pradesha walin sidu wana sankramana 2.rakiya soya nagarayata paminima 3.welada katayuthu wala diyunuwa 4.paripalana katayuthu sankendranaya wima sidu wana karyayan anuwa nagara warga kirima 1.purawara purawarayak yanu thani nagarayak nowa upa nagara kalapaya thula nagara 10 k 15 k pamana pihita thibiya hakiya.gamirika kalapaya thula kuda nagara ha gamirika janawasa rashiyak atha.pradhana nagarayata rakiya sadaha saha sewa ha bhanda sadaha nithara sankramanaya karana jana kotas purawaraya thula sitithi.maha marga saha dumriya marga walin madhya nagaraya purawaraye sesu pradesha ha badi pawathi.

kalabalayak nathi, sansun, (nirasa wana tharamata) samanya warthamanaya kiyapanne, rate sthawarathwaya sandaha balaya sankendranaya wimak awashya nowana bawayi.
ewita rate winayak, nithiyak nathi wi yamata puluwan.
hawasa thiyana podi uthsaweta sudanam wenna gedara sudda pawithra karanna, para wisi gahanna, thintha ganna, layit wal ellanna pawule udawiya saha nada piriwara gajarameta wada.

baththaramulla densilkobbakaduwa mawathe idiwu basnahira palath sabha nawa godanagille manthri putuwak sadaha rupiyal laksha hayamaraka mudalak waya karamin putu thogayak widesha ratakin aanayanaya kirimak sidukarana bawata janatha wimukthi peramune basnahira palath sabha manthri lakshman nipunaaarachchi mahatha ada derana big fokas wadasatahanata ekwemin anawaranaya kaleya.

‘‘adu meheyum wiyadamak sahitha gunathmaka thaththwayen ihala wanija wahana labaganima sandaha komarshal bankuwa saha dimo samagama mita pera ganudenukaruwanta awakashaya laba di thibenawa nawatha wathawak, dimo samaga ekwa ganudenukaruwanta ithamath aakarshaniya pa්rathilabha idiripath kirimata hakiwima pilibandawa api ithamath sathutu wenawala’’ yanuwen mema nawa pa්rawardhana wadasatahana pilibandawa adahas dakwamin komarshal bankuwe widhayaka adhyaksha saha pa්radhana meheyum niladhari, es.

ranil wikramasinha mahatha parlimenthuwen nawatha agamathi kalahoth thama janadhipathi putuwe payakwath nositina bawa maithripala janapathiwaraya prakasha kirima thula idiri parlimenthu raswimanadi 113 k ho eeta wadi bahutharaya ranil wikramasinha dinagaththath wyawasthawe 42(4) waganthiya prakarawa janapathi magin parlimenthuwe wadi wihwasaya himi pudgalaya lesa ranil nam nokaranu atha. 42(4) wyawasthawe dakwenne 'janadhipathiwarayage mathaya anuwa parlimenthuwe wishwasaya uparima washayen athi parlimenthu mantha්riwaraya janadhipathiwaraya wisin aga්ramathyawaraya lesa path karanu labiya yuththe ya.”
ohu prakasha kaleya.

paharaganimath samaga waha madihathwimen deshiyawath jathyantharawath deshapalana paksha ha manawa himikam sanwidhana nagu hada nowannata ema deshapalana ka්riyakarin dedenage da iranama thinduwannata ida thibini.
